website_summaries.verdict: A great number of JJ’s fans have rejoiced at the style and performance of the new iteration. However, those with wider foot dimensions have been hugely disappointed with its narrower fit. They recommend sticking to the previous versions of the shoe as they fit much better.But those with average and narrower feet have been highly satisfied with their purchase as JJ III makes for a dashing workout and casual wear.
pros: Numerous buyers marvel at the old-schoolish design of the JJ III
They also laud its vibrant colorways
A good number of wearers enjoy how comfortable the shoe feels on the foot
The trainer’s performance for daily workouts and HIIT sessions has also received a myriad of praises
The majority of users consider the product to be well-built and made of quality materials
More than a few purchasers say that the shoe makes excellent casual wear
cons: The hype around JJ III comes crashing down for people with wider feet
They criticize the shoe’s tight and narrow fit, stating that the previous versions fit them well
A lot of people find it difficult to put on the footwear due to its tongue-less construction

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: I love the JJ Watt athletic shoes and have had two other pairs since they came out. Ordered this pair (JJ III), and it was very disappointing the new design kept me from even getting the shoes on my feet. I wear a size 10 shoe and could not fit into the 10, 10.5 nor the 11s. The tongue of the shoes is built into the shoe and it is harder than a deep dive wet-suit to put on ! Also note, these shoes are either made in Vietnam or China... Sham on you JJ !
customer_reviews.author: Hayes

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are beautiful but only useful if you have a tiny feet and won't walk a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful looking sneakers.. too bad can't wear them. Shoes are just too tight. First, my husband ordered his size which is size 11. Came in beautifully and nice quality but downfall is it's too small. He can't even put them on. Putting them on made him sweat! LOL! But seriously, my husband even have narrow feet. So he exchanged it for a size 12! 1inch bigger than his size.. and guess what?! Still doesn't fit!!! Also the design is poorly thought. You can not open the mouth or the lip of these shoes. One reason why!! But even though he already have put them on he still wasn't comfortable inside. So needed to return!!! Too bad!!
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Size 15 fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 15 for my son and they fit perfectly (true to size), look stylish and are comfortable. His foot is not narrow and he did not experience any of the problems that some of the other reviewers outlined regarding the sneaker being too narrow. No complaints - they were also a great price at less than $40.
customer_reviews.author: LoriAnnR

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoes but...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look nice. I bought them for the sole purpose of getting back into the gym. Kinda dissapointed in how they fit.. they fit size wise but initial put on was very hard to put on. The tongue is built into the shoes so its very hard slide your feet in. These shoes will not fit people with wide feet. Even after I was able to put them on, they seem pretty tight in the middle of the feet. Maybe in time they will break in but this is initial reaction. 3 star for now only because they feel light on my feet but we will see as time goes.
customer_reviews.author: Pao Vue

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes I’ve ever worn.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. I was worried at first because they don’t come in a wide and many reviews a read and watched online said that they do have a tight mid foot. Best advice I heard was to go up one size if you’re worried and I did that and the shoes are perfect. I’ve never had a pair of shoes that didn’t need to break in a little until now. These are hands down the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever worn. And a steal of a deal ordering them on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: robert varwig

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and good looking shoe. Unfortunately I wear a 13.5 and the width of these are so narrow that I could barely get my foot in. Had to return but wish they came in a wider size.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Bummer - loved these - wish they weren’t so narrow!
customer_reviews.text: Never got to wear them in, or do anything relevant for a good review on these. I LOVE this style - wish it worked out differently because they look so cool. Love the gum bottom and the shoe is a tank. Very stable and solid - what would be perfect for a training/gym shoe. The reviews are absolutely true - due to the unadjustable lacing, makes it hard to squeeze into. Order a 1/2 size larger at least. I’m returning, not exchanging, mainly because the shoe is built narrow and a 1/2 size bigger (longer) won’t really remedy my issue. Great if you have the right foot - I just didn’t personally.
customer_reviews.author: Aralius

customer_reviews.title: Get these shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are AMAZING! Yes, they were super tight around the ankle/heel area when I first put them on but they were roomy everywhere else so I decided to stick with what I got. Within 30 or so minutes they were already breaking in. Day 2 and they fit perfect. I wear 9.5 and ordered that size and very happy with this purchase. Very comfortable and perfect for heavy lifting!
customer_reviews.author: WhitsTheShit

customer_reviews.title: Excellent biking and workout shoe
customer_reviews.text: Got these for mountain biking and working out, and they do both well. Tread seems durable and sticks to pedals and any other surface like glue. The sole is relatively stiff for stability but is still flexible enough to be very comfortable. Only concern for some would be how snugly these shoes fit. On my very narrow feet, they fit great, but I suspect they'd be too tight for many people.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, but runs almost a half size too small/tight
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews I order a size 7.5D vs. my regular size of 7D based on the comments that the shoe ran tight and short. In hindsight I may have gotten by with my regular size of 7D. They do run a bit tight but the length appears true. I'll need to wear bulkier socks to ensure a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Patagonia Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Very Attractive Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Like the shoe. Bought larger as recommended by other buyers, still not the most comfortable for long walks. If you walk more than 10,000 steps is what a mean. Otherwise very attractive shoe which I wear for trips to the grocery store and other such trips.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Watts - Harris

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend unless you have narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: Extremely narrow and painful to wear. I love the look, but if you have normal width to wide feet, these are the exact opposite of what you need. I feel like these are a good idea, with poor execution.
customer_reviews.author: aciim5

customer_reviews.title: nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: mirroring an earlier post - they are a bit difficult to get on but they are built for exercise/activity and need to be snug. I wear a 13.5 wide (good luck finding right!) so i ordered my usual 14 and the fit is fine. Stable enough to have a great leg day and enough cushion for a mile on the dreadmill. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great, but take a while to break in.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look great and material is great. Downside is that they hurt a bit initially. I’m still breaking them in. I don’t wear them everyday, because they are not comfortable enough for that yet. My ankles get irritated. I’m positive that once I break them in, then they will be very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Overall the best shoe for multisport athletes, who do not like too much space in the toe area.
customer_reviews.text: Great for a more narrow foot, someone who likes a shoe to fit true. First week you may not like them, give them a chance, once the sole has been broken in the shoes almost molds to your foot. I tie my shoes tight , I weightlifting, crossfit , play multiple sports. Hands down the best shoes for multi sport athletes .
customer_reviews.author: Delia mays

customer_reviews.title: Great cross-trainer!
customer_reviews.text: I needed an indoor shoe since we are under quarantine. This JJ Watt shoe is a little narrow but not real bad. I went up a half size (like other reviews suggested) and it is a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Love the way they fit snug to my feet. I do cross training and have been searching for a good pair of snug shoes. I love the solid heel and toe bases. They make me feel grounded when doing squats, box jumps and any other leg lifts. I will but another pair
customer_reviews.author: Craig Martin

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fits very snug and is comfortable to wear. It seems like this shoe is made very well and will last sometime. It does make you feel more stable when lifting weights. I have used these for jogging and they do well in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Tough but comfortable after the breakin!!
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this shoe was just too damn rigid but after the break in they felt very good on my feet. They are the perfect shoe for my crossfit work outs they can handle just about anything from squats to burpees and running as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: These are the best athletic shoes I’ve ever purchased. Would absolutely recommend to anyone. I’ve become a huge fan of Reebok and glad they partner with great role models like J.J. Watt.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Shiers

customer_reviews.title: Love it, except...
customer_reviews.text: They need to rethink the tongue part of the shoe. No adjustment means it's difficult to put on if you have a high instep (like me). Otherwise great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Capizzi

customer_reviews.title: Narrow, runs small
customer_reviews.text: Ran small/narrow. My husband loves the JJ watt 2s but these fit different. Still nice and have to a family member, just size up
customer_reviews.author: Haleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great, but a little narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. But if you're like me and you have wide feet, they may take some breaking in. The first few days weren't very comfortable. Now I can slip them on fairly easily and I'm really happy with them. The soles are very durable and I see them lasting a long time.
customer_reviews.author: James kelley

customer_reviews.title: Tight at first, but once you break em in AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, slight disclaimer. As the other reviews stated, they are slightly narrow and hard to get on at first. However, once on, they feel really light and comfortable. I am not disappointed at all. I bought these so I can get back into a routine and start walking my local park, however this is a great training shoe for any level of fitness you possess. They also look really cool too!
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Mancha

customer_reviews.title: Durable, comfortable and cool looking.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. They are comfortable and durable. They have been great for outdoor basketball as well as everyday wear. He has gotten lots of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Drake

customer_reviews.title: Made for a specific type of foot.
customer_reviews.text: For the right foot type (runs narrow) this will provide great support! Just need to try before you buy because it is narrow and tight min foot.
customer_reviews.author: v14scar

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, fits a bit tight in the width. But then I bought them for working out, so they should be a little snug. They were just tighter than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this shoes but turn out to be just what I needed for my P90X3 workout. Excellent balance
customer_reviews.author: Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Size is too small
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 9, so I bought a 9. But the mouth of the shoe is so narrow I could not put my feet in.
customer_reviews.author: HC-Foto

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I wear orthopedics insole so my journal size was pretty tight only because the insole soles are sewn in and not removable. Other than that nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Tidy Therapist

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my son -- He loves them.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. He said they fit great and he loves the look.
customer_reviews.author: mbyrd35

customer_reviews.title: Awesome reeboks
customer_reviews.text: I own two pairs of these shoes but different colors. They are comfortable and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Juan C

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: They look cool and the gum soul is really nice for grip but they’re just way to small. I’d hate to buy a size bigger because 13s look like a dang banana boat.
customer_reviews.author: Valentino

customer_reviews.title: Awesome af
customer_reviews.text: For 50$ you can’t beat plus jj is my favorite player I got 2 pare
customer_reviews.author: Emilyann F Peinamalie

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the actively active!!!
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are in a word “perfect” great fit super comfort! Sturdy yet flexible. I recommend to anyone looking for a gym shoe or Even an active job shoe. The look amazing as well! I’m very happy with my purchase. I’ll get a different color as well to match other things.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Fenstermacher

customer_reviews.title: will not buy them again.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have a weird patter for the way they are laced up and it just does not work the way other shoes do. The opening where your foot slides into the shoe is WAY too small making it very difficult to put them on and adjust the laces. Once they are on they fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get on and off bc of shoe design
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks great and is durable material but the shoe tongue is attached so it is a slip-on design . This makes it a little hard to get on & off. You’ll have to stretch it out quite a bit. Once on it’s a good fit and very secure for workouts but also expect the heel to be sore while wearing these in
customer_reviews.author: Dan Bibeau

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe good lateral support Looks as good as it feels
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow feet so they are perfect!! They look fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: After the 3 day break in, they are my favorite shoes.
customer_reviews.author: JPP

customer_reviews.title: Entry is too tight.
customer_reviews.text: Size is already 1/2 up and looks right. But the entry is too tight, i could not get my feet on it. The look is really is nice, but comfort is really an issue. Will not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You cannot put them on!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are virtually impossible to put on. If they do not 'loosen' soon I will have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: ALL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes, little bit narrow thought!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes, super cool, great price I would buy it this again!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: You have to get at least one size up to enjoy this shoe
customer_reviews.author: XAVIER MATHIS

customer_reviews.title: Sweet shoe
customer_reviews.text: Little small for my brothers standard shoe size. He loves them. They look cool and he plans on making them gym shoes after he roughs um up a bit in the high school halls while impressing the ladies
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for training
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fittings, the tongue is not a problem at all, just is you are too lazy, great stability for training. Super comfy but not recommended for walking long distance
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: Extremely narrow. Don’t play basketball in them. Your feet and toes will be on fire.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hurm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Training
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for the gym excellent fix little tight at first but once they are broken in by far the best training shoe I’ve ever used. Down side is you need a shoe horn to get these shoes on very narrow opening, other than that will order again.
customer_reviews.author: JC32

customer_reviews.title: Way to narrow
customer_reviews.text: I love JJ but these shoes are so narrow no one I knew could comfortably get them on. Big disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Larry O.

customer_reviews.title: Love the styling and stability.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, great fit, more for training in the gym, very stable, in fact the most stable shoe I've ever had of this type. Not for any running (not that I'm going to run).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Foss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Trainers!
customer_reviews.text: I love this show! It’s supportive, comfortable, and stylish! I wear a size 11.5 men in Nike, and an 11.5 in these fit me perfect! JJ Watt you dirty dog.
customer_reviews.author: haley langer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small and narrow
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is extremely narrow. Couldn’t even get my foot in the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: James Galletta

customer_reviews.title: Hard fit
customer_reviews.text: The size was correct, but it was extremely difficult getting the shoe on. No elasticity in the ankle of the shoe. Once the shoe was on they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They are a little tight but I wont recommend for someone with wide feet But for the most part for me they fit good and have the support I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Yiovanni Perez

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY NARROW
customer_reviews.text: I wear a men's size 12. I could barely get my feet into these shoes. Extremely narrow and tight.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Sending them back
customer_reviews.text: Once I get it on its fine, way to tight to get my foot in easley.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Need better description
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was easy to thin and small for the advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Doucet

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Feels good so far only had for a week comfort is good stability good now let’s see how long they lasts
customer_reviews.author: Joe alfredo

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is suck!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes is to small! This shoe is design for those slim foot only...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mens Cross Trainer Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great overall training shoe, as a Strength Coach my feet are very important so having a shoe that will keep me going all day and then some is key!
customer_reviews.author: Vinny

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes, the heel was a bit tough and took some breaking in. 3 days later they felt a lot better. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for people with wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe but it's a fit discomforting over time because it hasnt stretched to the width of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jbayani

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Can't even stick my foot in these things. I would need to order 4 sizes bigger to hopefully be able to get my foot to fit in the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Don'tWorry AboutITAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Well made, great support
customer_reviews.text: Fit is great, very comfortable. Support and construction are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe will buy in other color just half a size smaller next time.
customer_reviews.author: EbonyRochelle Young

customer_reviews.title: Bought big as I knew getting on was difficult
customer_reviews.text: Little difficult to get on as it has no younger
customer_reviews.author: Sean McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: Too tight around the foot and very strenuous to put on. But, fits good.
customer_reviews.author: king james, jim slauson tresevant

customer_reviews.title: bad design
customer_reviews.text: Extremely difficult to put this shoe.. I had to buy a shoe horn. There is no tongue to loosen and it is very stiff around the opening.
customer_reviews.author: R J.

customer_reviews.title: Great look and feel, but arrived with glue on them.
customer_reviews.text: Rather disappointed that these shoes showed up with what looks like glue all over the tongue of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Seth T.

customer_reviews.title: Not for a wide foot
customer_reviews.text: Not for a person with a wide foot. Material and style are nice but I couldnt fit my foot in them. Just had to give them away
customer_reviews.author: Cornelius Young

customer_reviews.title: A solid lifting shoe.
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to put on because the attached tongue. But they are incredibly comfortable and have great support for lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Looks good so far
customer_reviews.text: Have only worn this once so far so good. Can't really give deep description with something so new.
customer_reviews.author: merri sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for a lot of different types of workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Kozakiewicz

customer_reviews.title: small opening on shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't even get my heal into the shoe the opening is so small and tight the material does not stretch to open up.
customer_reviews.author: MARTIN MEDINA JR.

customer_reviews.title: Uniquely amazing shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Wears like an aqua sock. That's what my family calls it. But it has a snug fit to get it on. Then it fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Tim R

customer_reviews.title: Proper fit or not.
customer_reviews.text: One of the lace straps case in stitched. It is a half size to big but the 14 are small.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, pretty good trainers
customer_reviews.text: It was a pretty comfortable feel, felt decent for my flat feet, but the sizes run a little on the smaller side
customer_reviews.author: A. Niles

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe! I don't have wide feet by any means, but these shoes run extremely narrow.
customer_reviews.author: CrammyRammy

customer_reviews.title: 😍😍
customer_reviews.text: My son ordered the shoes claiming to be comfortable and beautiful
customer_reviews.author: זאב אברמוביץ

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Just wearing few days after fall the shoes goes to a be almost broken. First time we met!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Overall great for training
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, good amount of space on the toe box. Call it my JJ squats for leg day!!
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is too narrow for my feet. Width of show was not specified so I had no clue.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Orders online are challenging
customer_reviews.text: It fits tighter than I like ... probably would not have bought them in person...
customer_reviews.author: Troy White

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: Heel pull to high rubbed a blister on the back of both Achilles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will break in
customer_reviews.text: Back of the shoe rubbed the Achilles raw. Once broke in not so bad
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Ordering is easy and it’s  always what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the shoes for my wife and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Araujo

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: The fit perfectly and were everything I had hoped for
customer_reviews.author: Tim Lorfing

customer_reviews.title: To hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: If you can get them on your feet, they may fit!
customer_reviews.author: Cal Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: if you have wide feet, order a size up. very narrow footed.

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoe
customer_reviews.text: A well made shoe! They don’t make them like this anymore

customer_reviews.title: Sewn tongue
customer_reviews.text: hard to get on with the ankle being sewn shut, had to cut mine

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit perfect came brand new like they were supposed to

customer_reviews.title: They are as shown in the picture
customer_reviews.text: While I like the shoe and the appearance, it did not fit my foot. I am returning it.

customer_reviews.title: Unless you have a skinny foot you will find they will not fit

customer_reviews.author: stan woodworth

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Jj Iii Cross Trainer
product_meta.description: Reebok was founded for one of the best reasons possible: athletes wanted to run faster. So in the 1890s, joseph william Foster made some of the first known running shoes with spikes in them. By 1895, he was in business making shoes by hand for top runners; and before long his fledgling company, j.W. Foster and sons, developed an international clientele of distinguished athletes.
